title: Our street sign on the corner of Masonboro Loop RD & Southwold DR.  in Wilmington,  has been missing for over 3 months.  I called DOT 2 mo\'s ago and still no replacement! Don\'t our tax dollars pay for this stuff? Why would it take so long to replace something so small?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7686
